posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge Boyce Washington SCARCE
posts.post_content:
N172 Old Judge Boyce Washington, a scare card. Pose 33-1, the front displays quite nicely with no creases , with a nice clear/bold image, it does appear to have been rebacked. 

$300 delivered.

Scott
